ygData.messageBody:
Once again, I offer no guarantee that the following information is
correct. What I will say, is that it is accurate to the best of my
knowledge.


> 1, Now that you have the basic stuff down, roughly how long
>does Hate take to clear now? I remember per patch people used
>to do planes in about 4 - 8 or so hours, baring problems. Due
>to pathing and such now, im curious how much longer poh will
>take on average.

We usually spend some extra time working the lower level to make sure
we have little "extra" aggro on level 2. This weekend, we were
hunting in 10-12 hour blocks... I would say we spend 3-4 hours in
lower before heading up. With that said, we have NEVER cleared upper.
We have killed a lot of MOBs, but tracking shows there to always be
plenty more. *Grins*


> 2. Have you come to a conclusion what the spawn time on the
>2nd floor mobs are? 12hrs same as level 1? Mini-bosses 24?
>less? more?

I cannot answer either of these. What I can say is that when we go
back up the next day, the MOBs have respawned. The mini-bosses see to
be on a >24 hour timer.


> 3. Have you found a trash can to store all those ceramonial
> robes? :)

Actually, yes! I have found a "secret storage" button located right
above my 8 inventory slots which does this quite well. I can't
remember exactly how the button is labeled, but I think it is
something like "Destroy". *Smiles*

Be well all,

Gaelthorne
Xegony
